00347 inline void DImage::setPixel(int x, int y, double val, int chan){
00348   int idx;
00349   if((x >= _w) || (y >= _h) || (x < 0) || (y < 0)){
00350     fprintf(stderr, "DImage::setPixel(%d,%d) out of bounds w=%d h=%d\n",
00351       x, y, _w, _h);
00352     return;
00353     // abort();
00354   }
00355   if((chan >= _numChan) && (DImage_cmplx != _imgType)){
00356     fprintf(stderr, "DImage::setPixel() chan=%d, image only has %d channels\n",
00357       chan, _numChan);
00358     abort();
00359   }
00360   idx = chan * _w * _h + _w * y + x;
00361   switch(_imgType){
00362     case DImage_u8:
00363       {
00364   pData[idx] = (D_uint8)val;
00365       }
00366       break;
00367     case DImage_u16:
00368       {
00369   ((D_uint16*)pData)[idx] = (D_uint16)val;
00370       }
00371       break;
00372     case DImage_u32:
00373   ((D_uint32*)pData)[idx] = (D_uint32)val;
00374       break;
00375     case DImage_RGB:
00376     case DImage_RGB_16:
00377       fprintf(stderr,
00378         "DImage::setPixel() wrong function called for RGB image\n");
00379       abort();
00380       break;
00381     case DImage_flt_multi:
00382   ((float*)pData)[idx] = (float)val;
00383       break;
00384     case DImage_dbl_multi:
00385   ((double*)pData)[idx] = (double)val;
00386       break;
00387     case DImage_cmplx:
00388       if((chan < 0) || (chan > 1)){
00389   fprintf(stderr, "DImage::setPixel() chan=%d. Must be 0(real part) or "
00390     "1(imaginary part)\n", chan);
00391   abort();
00392       }
00393       {
00394   std::complex<double> *pcmplx;
00395   
00396   idx = _w * y + x;
00397   pcmplx = (std::complex<double> *)pData;
00398   if(0 == chan){
00399     pcmplx[idx] = val;
00400   }
00401   else{
00402     pcmplx[idx] = std::complex<double>(0.,val);
00403   }
00404       }
00405   
00406       break;
00407     default:
00408       fprintf(stderr, "DImage::setPixel() bas case value\n");
00409       abort();
00410   }
00411 
00412 }
00413 
00414 inline void DImage::setPixel(int x, int y, int Rval, int Gval, int Bval){
00415   int idx;
00416   if((x >= _w) || (y >= _h) || (x < 0) || (y < 0)){
00417     fprintf(stderr, "DImage::setPixel(%d,%d) out of bounds w=%d h=%d\n",
00418       x, y, _w, _h);
00419     return;
00420     // abort();
00421   }
00422   idx = 3 * (_w * y + x);
00423   if(_imgType == DImage_RGB){
00424     pData[idx] = (D_uint8)Rval;
00425     pData[idx+1] = (D_uint8)Gval;
00426     pData[idx+2] = (D_uint8)Bval;
00427   }
00428   else if(_imgType == DImage_RGB_16){
00429     D_uint16 *p16;
00430     p16 = (D_uint16*)pData;
00431     p16[idx] = (D_uint16)Rval;
00432     p16[idx+1] = (D_uint16)Gval;
00433     p16[idx+2] = (D_uint16)Bval;
00434   }
00435   else{
00436     fprintf(stderr, "DImage::setPixel() RGB function called for"
00437       " non-RGB image\n");
00438     abort();
00439   }
00440 }

00443 inline D_uint8* DImage::dataPointer_u8() const{
00444 #ifdef DEBUG
00445   if((DImage_u8 != _imgType) && (DImage_RGB != _imgType))
00446     fprintf(stderr, "DImage::dataPointer_u8() on wrong type of image %d\n",
00447       (int)_imgType);
00448 #endif
00449   return (D_uint8*)pData;
00450 }
00451 inline D_uint16* DImage::dataPointer_u16() const{
00452 #ifdef DEBUG
00453   if((DImage_u16 != _imgType) && (DImage_RGB_16 != _imgType))
00454     fprintf(stderr, "DImage::dataPointer_u16() on wrong type of image\n");
00455 #endif
00456   return (D_uint16*)pData;
00457 }
00458 inline D_uint32* DImage::dataPointer_u32() const{
00459 #ifdef DEBUG
00460   if(DImage_u32 != _imgType)
00461     fprintf(stderr, "DImage::dataPointer_u32() on wrong type of image\n");
00462 #endif
00463   return (D_uint32*)pData;
00464 }
00465 inline float* DImage::dataPointer_flt(int channel) const{
00466 #ifdef DEBUG
00467   if(DImage_flt_multi != _imgType)
00468     fprintf(stderr, "DImage::dataPointer_flt() on wrong type of image\n");
00469   if((channel < 0) || (channel >= _numChan))
00470     fprintf(stderr, "DImage::dataPointer_flt() on invalid channel\n");
00471 #endif
00472   return (float*)&(pData[_w*_h*channel*sizeof(float)]);
00473 }
00474 inline double* DImage::dataPointer_dbl(int channel) const{
00475 #ifdef DEBUG
00476   if(DImage_dbl_multi != _imgType)
00477     fprintf(stderr, "DImage::dataPointer_dbl() on wrong type of image\n");
00478   if((channel < 0) || (channel >= _numChan))
00479     fprintf(stderr, "DImage::dataPointer_dbl() on invalid channel\n");
00480 #endif
00481   return (double*)&(pData[_w*_h*channel*sizeof(double)]);
00482 }
00483 inline std::complex<double>* DImage::dataPointer_cmplx() const{
00484   return (std::complex<double>*)pData;
00485 }
